game.name: They Are Rising
game.shortDescription: They Are Rising is an RTS strategy game set against the backdrop of the apocalypse. Combine skills, build a massive army, establish shelters, and fight against large numbers of enemies. How long can you survive?
game.shortDescriptionEn: They Are Rising is an RTS strategy game set against the backdrop of the apocalypse. Combine skills, build a massive army, establish shelters, and fight against large numbers of enemies. How long can you survive?
